amendment.description: An amendment numbered 19 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to increase and decrease funding for the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau by $635,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ramirez amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ramirez amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ramirez amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
